snippet: The musician and interior designer on function, comfort and what he learned by peeking in Joe Namath’s windows.
abstract: Interview with musician and interior designer Lenny Kravitz discusses recent design projects and his inspiration.
lead_paragraph: The musician and interior designer on function, comfort and what he learned by peeking in Joe Namath’s windows.

headline.seo: Questions for Lenny Kravitz on Design
headline.main: For Lenny Kravitz, a Hard Hat Is More Than a Fashion Statement
